name: Adds new JustClick customer subscription to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time you received a new customer subscription in JustClick, Make will automatically add selected data to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11mu-48H1Eal5rO1V2gJL3uJBIKhd-ebB-I-S0iSvnoM/edit?usp=sharing)
